name: The Exit (jaylas)
description:
In this game you play two characters, who have to escape from an old factory by completing one room after another. By clicking the left mousebutton you can switch between the two characters. So try to position them as useful as possible before you switch and then use the frozen player to solve the room.

No premade assets used!

Follow us on Instagram for updates: https://www.instagram.com/waldigames/
